value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face|Prince Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Princess Veronica...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|My brother... Is he dead?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...I'm so sorry. It was...all my fault.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Your fault? Then you will take
the blame? I must feud with you,
as ever?$k$pThere is no escaping the fate
of Askr and Embla, it seems.$k$pWhich of us will live? You?$k$pOr will it be me who walks away?$k$pIt doesn't matter anymore.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face|Spending time with you two...
Getting to know you...$k$pIt was a mistake. I was a fool.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No, don't say that...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Had I stayed away, you would
be just another enemy.$k$pIf I didn't know you, I wouldn't have
to feel this way...$k$p
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Urgh...guhhh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm sorry, Veronica.$k$p

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Urrgh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Please, I beg you... Stay down.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Enemy,Face_Anger|$c255,0,0,255|Not yet... I am still here...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Embla!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Enemy,Face_Anger|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh... Not rid of me yet...$k$p$c255,0,0,255|At least you, prince who inherited
Askr's blood—you must yet die by
my hand.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|When you meet Askr again, give
him a message for me. His love
for mortals was wasted.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|Now, if you do not wish to deliver
the message so soon, you must
take this head off these shoulders.$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|N-no!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Enemy,Face_Smile|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh... You have no way
to win against me.$k$p$EFace_Cool|$c255,0,0,255|Do you see, Askr?! Do you see how
weak they are? How easily your
precious mortals become nothing?$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,0,0,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi500|Urrgh...$k$pZach...ari...as...$k$pThis is...our...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Enemy,Face_Smile|$c255,0,0,255|Hm-hm-hmh... What's this? A last
wish perhaps? Begging for your life?$k$p$c255,0,0,255|Wail! Wail so Askr can hear you!$k$p$Sbs5000|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|This is our...our...$k$pThis is our plan.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Enemy,Face_Pain|$c255,0,0,255|What?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Ash! Now!$k$p$Sbs1000|$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-yes! Right away!$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE16_03,0|$EFace_Cool|Key of Yggdrasill, open the way.$k$pOpen walls that enclose! Open the
gate from which freedom flows!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$Fi3000|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Enemy,Face_Pain|$c255,0,0,255|What is—$k$p$EFace_Cool|$c255,0,0,255|By Embla's will, close the way.$k$p$c255,0,0,255|Close the sky. Close the stone.
Close it all. Become...alone!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo2000,255,0,0,255|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Enemy,Face_Pain|$Fi2000|$c255,0,0,255|Wh-what is this?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|As I suspected. The power to seal
the Yggdrasill Key is beyond you!$k$pIt is a fruit that bears the power
of the gods...$k$pNow, you will release Princess
Veronica, Embla...and you will
then disappear.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Urrgh...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|This...cannot be...$k$pH-how...$k$pIt's...not possible. I had thought
of everything...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Zacharias only made you think
your victory was assured.$k$pYou were cautious...and even detected
the key we tried to keep hidden away
from you.$k$pYou all but crushed any chance we
had at victory.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|I did. I know I did.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|And Zacharias died a meaningless
death because of our miscalculation.
We were left without any options.$k$pOr so you thought.$k$pZacharias did not throw his life away
for nothing.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Pain|N-no, it can't be— That damned—
The key?!$k$pHe took his own life? For what?
For...this girl?!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica2_F_Normal,Face_Cry|...Xander told me about the fruit
that would be entrusted to me.
A message, from my brother.$k$pAt the time, I didn't understand.
But now...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|There is no one else who shares
your blood, Lady Embla—no one
else for you to take.$k$pThis is the end for you.$k$p$Sbs150|
